The feeling you get when you walk through the famous revolving doors is so overwhelming. The team cater for your every need and do so without any fuss at all. This really should be a 6 star hotel as it just defies expectations continuously. If you can, I really do urge you to spend a night here

room_type: Luxury Double Room with Two Double Beds
text: We had 2 rooms; a double double and a superior queen, both rooms were fantastic and spacious. The nespresso machine was very welcome, and the toiletries are pleasant. If I was forced to make a negative comment it would be that the robes provided are clearly only for very very slender women. A larger lady/ a man would not be able to wear these, they are tiny! However, everything else was so perfect, it didn't seem to be a big deal. Everywhere in the hotel is absolutely spotless and well presented and the staff are without exception excellent. My Mum was made to feel special at every opportunity as we were celebrating her 70th birthday. Breakfast was perfect and our evening meal in the Savoy Grill was just fantastic. The chateaubriand was perfection and as with all areas of the hotel, the level was service was exceptional. The Beaufort bar is a really relaxing venue with attentive service and we enjoyed drinks in here both before and after our meal. The residents lounge was the perfect place to grab a quick drink whilst waiting for our lunch and was a welcome quieter area. As we were arriving, the Christmas decorations were being installed...it really is absolutely beautiful and made the lobby area in particular feel very special. If you are considering staying here, I urge you to do it. It is worth every penny. I would stay here again in a heart beat.

name: Nicola
text: I stayed at The Savoy with my Mum to celebrate her 70th birthday. We were looked after exceptionally well as soon as we arrived and the staff were all friendly, warm and attentive. The hotel was in the perfect location for exploring Covent Garden and the West End and we were in walking distance to the theatre where we had booked a show. We had drinks in the Beaufort Bar where the ambience was welcoming, cosy with a vibrant buzz and the staff's recommendations were always spot on to what we asked for. Dinner in Gordon Ramsay's restaurant was outstanding with the staff, again, friendly and attentive and open to hearing about our experience. Our meal was exceptional and we couldn't fault any of it. This was a special treat but has given me cherished memories. Oh and they also brought up to our room a special birthday treat for my Mum which was a special touch.

Small touches like a welcome with my name on was shown on the TV screen and our server for breakfast remembered everything. Everything visible was quality and the bed was luxurious. text: Everything about the Savoy is outstanding, the staff were so helpful and friendly amd the Hotel is pure luxury. On this visit it was my Wife’s Birthday and the Staff could not have done more for her on this special occasion. Thank you so much to all of the Staff at the Savoy and we look forward to returning.

name: Stephen
room_type: Luxury Double Room with Two Double Beds

name: Julie

text: Everything in the savoy is exceptional. Everything. Top of the pyramid would be the amazing staff. Who frankly are totally amazing at what they do, every single one. We stayed for two nights and I never sleep well when away but I slept like a log. I was almost tearful on us checking out, the experience was so fabulous. I would never ever stay anywhere else now. It was so unbelievably amazing in every way.

name: Martyn
text: Savoy is excellent the Grill was first class had an amazing time would highly recommend as a little getaway. We have been on a number of occasions and never disappointed, staff are always friendly and attentive.

Great massages and memorable cocktails…. awesome breakfasts.

name: Lorraine
text: The Savoy was beautiful and the staff service was excellent. Breakfast was wonderful, along with the amazing atmosphere and drinks at the Beaufort bar we loved it all. Our dinner at the Savoy grill was wonderful and we cannot wait to return.

name: Maralyn

text: The main bedroom was reasonably sized with good facilities and excellent beds. However the bathroom was somewhat small and cramped. The decor of the bathroom was also dated. The hotel itself was in a very good location. Overall the savoy staff, (excluding the bar grill "Gordon Ramsey" staff), were absolutely exceptional and we could not fault them at all! I would return to the Savoy purely based on the excellent staff service. The Savoy itself, excluding the bar grill Gordon Ramsey restaurant, is one of the best pleasurable experiences I’ve had.

text: The two waiters we had for afternoon tea were absolutely amazing, could not have had nicer and attentive people serving us. We had a wonderful and easy chat about TV and other nerdy things and it made our evening fantastic and thats on top of the wonderful food we had! While not vegan myself, my partner is lactose intolerant so we ordered the vegan tea and everything on it had a lot of thought put into it and tasted fantastic. The inroom dining was a lovely surprise, the food was wonderful and our waiters were charming, polite and extremely helpful! The room staff did a amazing job keeping the room tidy and clean for us when we got back from our day out, which was a lovely surprise to come back to! The concierge staff could not do enough for you, absolute stars and helped us with all our enquiries without hesitation and were always there then we needed them!

The Beaufort bar was intimate & friendly & the staff were helpful especially when we were trying to decide on which cocktails to have & even made something special with ingredients which we liked. Room service food & drink were delivered quickly with a small table set up in the room then collected within a few minutes when finished with. We have had a very special stay with you all at The Savoy thank you.

text: Saved hard to treat my hubby for his 50th to an overnight stay in the savoy hotel and dinner in Gordon’s steak grill. Couldn’t fault the savoy hotel. Impeccable service/clean,comfortable absolutely blown away. Even upgraded us Thanku. Breakfast was gorgeous, felt very special. Dinner in Gordon’s grill was lovely unlike the service which really let us down. Waited ages for our table to be ready that had been previously booked weeks beforehand to then be shown our table to then wait ages for a drink. We paid a fortune for a bottle of wine to pour it ourselves. Felt very neglected especially the prices that we paid. We found out the next day Mr Ramsay was actually filming upstairs so they were extremely busy. We still deserved better as it was a special treat for hubster. Seeing Gordon the next day at breakfast was amazing. Top bloke.

text: Great location. Room , bed and bath was really comfortable and clean and all we were expecting and more from the Savoy . Staff all very attentive and friendly. Breakfast and setting for meal really nice .

name: Brian
text: Lovely, really obliging to get me freshly squeezed pineapple. Very calming atmosphere

name: Nicholas
text: The quilts on the beds were to thick for the time of year - very hot even with the sir conditioning on- but that was all

name: Alice
text: Staff were extremely helpful in every handling we had with them. The solar terrace was lovely for a pre dinner drink and the savoy grill was a treat for breakfast. Room was comfortable, with an exceptional bathroom.

name: Chantal
room_type: Luxury King Room with River View
text: Wonderful stay. Amazing hotel. Beautiful room with beautiful view. (We were upgraded) Our Butler Flavia was excellent. As were all the members of Staff. Wish we could have stayed longer.

name: Harry
text: The whole experience was fantastic! Friendly staff that made my wife's birthday feel extra special! Attention to detail is fantastic!

name: Daryl
text: The whole experience was outstanding. I knew it would be expensive so it is difficult to say that it is value for money. It is however the most memorable hotel I have stayed in. The ambiance is peaceful, staff respectful, friendly and attentive. You are treated as a VIP guest from start to finish. Food in the Grill was superb as was the breakfast in the Thames Foyer. The Solas and Beaufort Bars were delightful. As a special treat for my wife's birthday, the Savoy delivered on every level. With a trip to the theatre for good measure, it was truly a weekend to remember.....Thank you to all at the Savoy

name: Mark
text: Great location excellent staff

name: Anthony
text: Brilliant hotel. Everything is expensive but you get what you pay for. Very good service, fantastic staff (especially Jessica, Anna-Maria, Rose and the breakfast staff). We were expecting a stuffy hotel but it wasn't, more smart casual. Very good location. Will definitely stay again

name: John
text: Great location & superb decor. Staff are absolutely amazing

name: Jonathan
text: Beautiful hotel for a special occasion. You get what you pay for and this definitely proves it!

name: Grant
text: We had a lovely night at the Savoy. I proposed to my partner (it was a yes) and the staff couldn’t have been more helpful especially Dylan in reservations who moved all restaurant reservations around. Excellent service

name: Keith
text: Stayed one night for a special birthday celebration. Amazing hotel and staff. Breakfast in savoy grill, drinks In Beauforts bar.

name: Allan
text: Everything was perfect the staff and hotel ❤

name: Paul

text: Very warm welcome, attention to detail and went out of their way to make my birthday stay memorable. I could have moved into the glorious marble bathroom with a rainfall shower. We both had beauty treatments which were fabulous. The flowers by Belinda ordered by my friend were a beautiful surprise alongside a yummy little chocolate birthday cake under a glass dome. The floral displays throuhout the hotel are just amazing. We ate in the Savoy grill which has a lovely art deco ambience and had the 5 course tasting menu...be warned ...the portions are huge, you need a big appetite! The whole stay was a beautiful experience.

The staff are so friendly and can’t do enough for you, highly recommend the Savoy, for me, it was a once in a lifetime experience, I’ll never forget it! Thankyou Savoy x

name: Elia
text: Kaspar and American Bar.

name: Siobhan
room_type: Luxury Double Room with Two Double Beds
text: What a fantastic place to stay, the whole experience was amazing from arriving to leaving. On arrival we were asked to a private room to check-in which made you feel special, the decoration and facilities were fantastic. Our room wasn't ready when we arrived so they put us in the bar and gave us complimentary cocktails, we had to leave after 4 because they just kept bringing them which was great but we were feeling tipsy, it turned out that the only reason our room wasn't ready was because they were blowing up balloons and decorating the room for my birthday they also gave me a cake and a card from everyone at the hotel. Our coffee machine was leaking so I contacted reception who sent someone straight away to fix but then sent complimentary coffee, Cake and biscuits on a fabulous fancy tray it was amazing. I have stayed at many hotels around the world and this one was at the top of the list for rating...... Thank you to everyone for making my stay the best I had a fantastic weekend celebrating my birthday.

name: Paul
room_type: Luxury Double Room with Two Double Beds

name: Hanof
text: The place is amazing, the staff are so professional. The concierge are working until midnight. service is so fast and nice . it deserve every penny. Covent Garden was so close .

name: Robert
text: Savoy is in a class all by itself. The Savoy Grill is wonderful for dinner. Rooms, beautiful. Staff. Beyond helpful.

name: Agnita
room_type: Deluxe Junior Suite with City View
text: Everything This has to be by far the best hotel experience I’ve ever had , the staff we attended to us were superstars out of a superhero movie , The only upset I had is when I did book a spa nail treatment on my last night Which was done on the phone through guest services All confirmed for 530 pm I had rushed around in London all day rearranged my plans for this appointment and once I got there was told it hadn’t actually been made I was so upset not angry but tearful Disappointed Also Gordon Ramsey’s restaurant I wanted to enjoy a beef Wellington but was told it was. Only for 2 people again disappointment The server had recommended the pudding to me ale pudding but didn’t warn me that it was salty as hell Omg blood pressure hell I had been travelling for days with hardly no sleep and working so it tried to complain I do love Gordon ramsey and have been to a great deal of his restaurants around the world So please tell Gordon if he could do the beef wellington for 1perdon to have please like at steak in Vegas or hell kitchen I will return to savoy in the future I did tell the reception staff about my spa disaster and was told that my next visit I’d get free treatment

name: Nick
text: I had not stayed here since the mid 1980's, and I was not disappointed. A very special birthday treat and would recommend to anyone.

name: Gary
text: Booked the Savoy for my wife’s 50th birthday. The service from staff from arrival to leaving was exceptional. Staff arranged champagne to the room and drinks in the cocktail bar.This attention to detail was exactly what I had hoped for.

name: Julie
room_type: Luxury Double Room with Two Double Beds
text: Beautiful surroundings with exceptionally attentive staff and attention to detail. Made very welcome.

name: Christine
text: Everything! We stayed at The Savoy to celebrate my Mum's 65th Birthday and from the moment we arrived to the moment we left, everything was perfect! We were greeted by two doorman who were lovely and took care of us and our bags. During check-in we were looked after by a lovely receptionist. We can't recall her name, however she had long dark hair and was so nice and put us at ease straight away. She talked about us celebrating Mum's birthday and didn't rush us at all. Once we had our room key, Robert accompanied us to floor 6 because I don't like lifts! Robert was reassuring and very kind. The room was a complimentary upgrade and exceeded my expectations. It was big, with a mini hall, large bedroom and a huge bathroom which sparkled. On the table there was a gift tied in a Savoy bow for my Mum's birthday- a leather bound notebook and chocolate bar. This is typical of what we experienced; all these small details and touches made a huge difference. We then had a knock at the door and The Savoy had prepared a birthday chocolate cake! Thank you for the gifts, this was so generous. After we had unpacked, we spent some time in the pool. We were relaxing in a pool in a serene environment, with the hustle and bustle of central London surrounding us, but we were completely chilled out. We had dinner at the Savoy Grill which was excellent. Still full from our dinner, we enjoyed a splendid breakfast overlooking The Thames in Kaspers. Our waiter was attentive, polite and couldn't do enough. Again, this is typical of the service at The Savoy- the people literally cannot do enough for you and it is world class. In the evening we returned to collect our bags and the receptionist who checked us in hugged and kissed us goodbye. She remembered us from the day before and chatted away, making us feel very valued. Thank you, we will return :)

name: Volkert
text: Lovely location in centre of the city

name: Nick
text: Clean comfortable luxurious

name: Roger
text: I had single occupancy of a deluxe King Room. For me, the best feature was the bathroom: the walk-in overhead shower was superb. Others might go for the bed (which was huge) or the breakfast (likewise). The hotel's location meant I could easily go for a morning walk along the Embankment.

name: Louise
text: Our room was amazing and sound proof with a huge bed and marble bathroom. Breakfast was included in the package and we could have whatever we wanted off the a la carte menu and stay as long as we wanted. The staff were so happy even working over xmas and couldn't help us enough making us feel special. We walked along the Thames on Christmas day and strolled around Covent garden so couldn't have had a better location. Everything went like clockwork and made our Christmas so unique.

name: Julie
text: The welcome sign in chocolate and the cake lollies in our room was a lovely touch, which we all enjoyed. We traveled with a friend in a wheelchair, the hotel accommodated him well. We Particularly liked the doorman, who was only too happy to assist us when we needed it, and with a smile. 😊

name: Jennifer
text: The breakfast was excellent

name: Joanna
text: Everything 👍😎

name: Sandra
text: Had a lovely 4 days with you, Everyone was so helpful. Savoy Hotel is a wonderful place to stay. Thank you all very much

name: Andrew
text: Great location, friendly staff and fantastic facilities, restaurants and bars

name: Karan
text: We booked for weekend stay- 50th Wedding Anniversary- it was amazing! The staff were fantastic, could not be more professional, helpful and genuine. Really made us feel welcome. We also dined in the Grill restaurant and Simpsons, both great! However, Simpsons won it for me by a small margin, I preferred the menu more. Both dining experiences were a treat and again the staff were attentive, very impressive. The whole Savoy experience has been priceless, so glad we chose here to spend our time in such a beautiful Hotel, amazing staff and fabulous ambience. We did not want to leave! Thank you for such a wonderful time and contributing to some wonderful memories for us to reflect upon in our golden years.

name: Hugh
text: Breakfast, excellent. Location, very convenient. Also, it was my wife`s special birthday and they treated her very well. They even allowed me to play a few tunes to her on their grand piano (I happen to be a musician).

I am very grateful to the hotel’s team whom made me feel that I am at my home and between my family. My deep thanks to Gregg from the concierge team for helping me in following up and solving an issue happened with taxi payment. He is so professional and did it with full care. My Grateful to Marta in the front desk and the luggage master Lukazs. My sincere appreciation to everyone. The hotel worths every penny!

The bathroom facilities were splendid and the room had enough plugs to charge four devices at once. Everything worked seemlessly and everything was spotlessly clean. The breakfast was wonderful and all the staff were very friendly and dealt with every issue that arose swiftly and pleasantly.

name: Andrew
text: We have stayed at the Savoy several times as a family, it deserves its reputation as one of the great hotels. The atmosphere is very civilised and welcoming. The staff on the door, in the foyer and the birdcage room are excellent. Breakfast was included as part of our package. The lady at the welcome point tries to put you in Kaspers, rather than asking you which space you would prefer. On the first morning I insisted we'd prefer to eat in the Thames Foyer (it's more lighter and refined) and the insistence was rewarded as we treated wonderfully and the whole meal was an enjoyable experience.

name: Ana
text: We booked the Savoy for my parents 40th wedding anniversary. They had been travelling across Europe and this was their last stop and it did not disappoint! The Team at the Savoy checked in with me so I could tell them when my parents were arriving. My parents were greeted like royalty and felt very very special. The staff congratulated them for their anniversary and a lovely card and chocolate cake was waiting for them in their room. The hotel is such a beautiful landmark in London that it should be a must see for everyone.

text: ++ + Ideal location for Covent Garden opera and theaters, including of course the Savoy, traditional home of Gilbert and Sullivan. We had dinner at Kaspar's and our waitress saved us some time by getting our ticket from the box office and delivering them with the check. + Each of the rooms is unique and comfortably appointed. They are unobtrusive with daily cleaning and turn down service. + Large bathtubs (if you ask) + Free water provided each evening. In room coffee and tea facilities are top notch. + All the necessary conveniences are tucked away unobtrusively +Staff throughout hotel are trained to recognize hotel guests and treat them warmly. +Raw bar at Kaspar's is 1st rate.

text: お食事がとても美味しいです。朝食は、30分で食べたいとリクエストしたら、迅速なサービスで美味しい時間を過ごせました。 プールもリラックス出来て、とても良かったです。

name: S
text: とにかく部屋が可愛い。薔薇の壁紙やシャンデリア、たくさんの白い扉と鏡が並び、小説の中に入り込んだようなステイが楽しめる。推理小説の舞台になりそうな美しい廊下は歩くだけで心が踊った。スタッフは頼んだことはすぐに対処してくれる。ギフトショップも兼ねたケーキ屋さんもおすすめ(曜日によって閉店時間が異なるので注意)。滅多に手が出ない価格帯だが、泊まってよかったと思わせてくれるホテル。

name: Laetitia
text: La gentillesse du personnel et l l’échange du lieu

name: Sylvain
text: Très bon réveillon Merci Elodie et Maxim

name: Manuel
text: Wir feierten im Hotel Savoy unseren 40sten Hochzeitstag und wurden dazu vom Hoteldirektor Ian Kidd und seinem Team sehr herzlich beglückwünscht und haben ein besonders schönes Zimmer erhalten. Der ganze Aufenthalt war perfekt, vielen Dank!

name: Jaroslav
text: Das Personal ist sehr sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Ganz besonders Rosaria im Service ist hervorzuheben

name: Elna-margret
room_type: Luxury King Room with River View
text: Sehr sehr schönes Hotel, wir hatte die beste Aussicht in ganz London

name: Naosaokaorin
text: 便利で治安も良く、アメニティも充実していた ペントハウスはバスタブもあり快適でした

name: Rob
text: Engelse voorname stijl. Entree onder dak.

name: Eric
text: Service vraiment excellent: professionnel et très attentionné, grande grande classe Bon emplacement très pratique à côté des théâtres et des ballades sympa

name: Marco
text: La struttura è molto accogliente , Staff eccellente

name: Guillaume
text: Lieu unique et chargé d'histoire. Magnifique hall, salons, Thames foyer... Personnel très prévenant et agréable. Literie extrêmement confortable, belle chambre. Propreté, hygiène irréprochable. Petit déjeuners EXCEPTIONNELS : choix, goût, qualité et fraicheur des produits sont au rdv. American Bar vaut le détour, superbe ambiance piano. Très très bien situé… Le tout pour un tarif "abordable" (+/- 500€ la nuit), comparé à certains palaces parisiens

name: Daisy
text: Alles. Heel vriendelijk personeel, prachtig hotel, geweldige locatie. Heel rustige kamers.

name: Tzahi
text: מלון נהדר , מיקום פנטסטי, שירות מעל ומעבר

name: Michiko
text: サービスは細かいところまで気を配られていて、とても寛げました。お部屋もとても可愛く、同時に歴史を感じさせる重厚さと気品がありました。そのいっぽうで、施設は最新で、機能的でした。ベッドは毛布と枕がふかふかで、寝心地は抜群です。食事は朝食、夕食、バーを利用しましたが、どれもイギリスとは思えない程美味しかったです。金額は高いですが、その価値がある内容でした。

name: Frederic
room_type: Luxury Double Room with Two Double Beds
text: La beauté de l’hôtel, le confort des lits, l’emplacement, le spa

name: Yukiko
text: 表玄関やチェックイン、チェックアウトのスタッフは素晴らしいと思う。インテリアはクラシカルで英国らしい。

name: Kevin
text: Het personeel was supervriendelijk en gastvrij!

name: Gotthard
text: Die Freundlichkeit des Personals sowie die Hilfsbereitschaft sind außergewöhnlich. Mir hat die klassische Musik auf dem Zimmer gefallen und die Tatsache, dass ich am Anreisetag erst um 22.15 h ins Restaurant kommen konnte, das Restaurant um 23.00 h schließt und ich bedient wurde, als wenn ich der wichtigste Gast wäre und nicht verspürte, dass das Personal gern schließen wollte.

name: Alberto
text: La struttura è molto accogliente, lo staff disponibile e ospitale. Camera grande, letto molto comodo

name: Hanne
text: Allure en personeel

name: Stephane
text: Tout était bien

name: Bart
text: Ik verbleef hier reeds verschillende malen en de ervaring wordt steeds beter. Je wordt er omringd door supervriendelijke en behulpzame attente mensen die er alles aan doen om uw verblijf zo goed mogelijk te maken en geen steek willen laten vallen. Het hotel is luxueus maar gezellig. Men voelt er zich thuis. De kamers zijn allen erg comfortabel en die met rivierzicht onovertrefbaar. De lokatie is erg goed en centraal, alles in Londen goed bereikbaar.

name: Hiroshi
text: 自転車を借りることになっていたが、手続きが曖昧

name: Monica
text: El lugar maravilloso. Todas las comodidades incluidas. Personal extremadamente amable. Se hacen cargo de todo. La pieza maravillosa . El desayuno riquísimo. Me encantaría ir nuevamente

name: Keiko
room_type: Luxury Double Room with Two Double Beds
text: サービス、手配など全て手際が良く、快適に過ごせました。ドアマンが挨拶してくれるのですが、毎度名前を付けて挨拶して下さるのには驚きました。 毎晩、部屋に戻ると子供散らかしたままのヌイグルミが愛らしくデコレーションされて迎えてくれるのが、楽しみでした。

name: Ana
text: Las instalaciones

name: 元武
text: 订单是两间相同的房间，实际入住的一间要大点

name: Paula
text: Um dos funcionários pertencentes à segurança foi extremamente rude e pediu-me que saisse do hotel. Ao que parece estava a decorrer uma festa privada de algum hospede famoso e havia uma serie de pessoas concentradas na porta do bar dentro do hotel possivelmente na expetativa que o mesmo abandonasse a referida festa. O empregado pediu a essas pessoas que se retirassem e quando eu fiquei (estava apenas a aguardar a vinda da minha amiga do nosso quarto), pediu-me rudemente que saisse sem sequer ter a preocupaçao de confirmar antes se eu me encontrava com esse grupo de pessoas ou se era hospede do hotel. Muito desagradável.

name: Katja
text: Sehr gutes Frühstück

name: Paul
text: In erster Linie war die Lage des Hotels perfekt. Eine sehr freundliche und angenehme Atmosphäre. Guter, herrausragender Empfang-.

name: Petraz
room_type: Luxury Double Room with Two Double Beds
text: Centrale, organizzato, standing, cortesia personale, servizi in generale.

name: Giorgio
text: colazione e servizio eccellenti

name: Nobuo
text: 場所がいい

name: Andreas
text: Ein klassisches Hotel in britischer Tradition. Tolle Bar, gutes Restaurant (Gordon Ramsey), hervorragender Service. Danke Ihr hättet gern in der EU bleiben können.

name: Takae
text: 天井が高くて 素敵なお部屋でした❣️シャンデリア・カーテン・壁紙などなど・・・ テレビの画面に自分の名前が記されていて 驚きました！おもてなしが嬉しかったです♫

name: Sibylle
text: Sehr gute Lage für Besuch der Royal Opera. Traditionsreich, aber nicht verstaubt.

name: Rubén
text: Todo maravilloso, un hotel de primera en toda la extrude la palabra.

name: Alexo911
text: Прекрасное расположение.

name: Naoko
text: 朝食が美味しくやクリームティーもピアノ生演奏で雰囲気も良い上に、地の利も良い スタッフが親切に道案内して下さいました。

name: Linn
text: Perfekt mycket bekvämt hotell med fantastiskt centralt läge. Mycket fint vi kände oss verkligen speciella från att vi kom och hela vistelsen. Väldigt hög service nivå vacker inredning och otroligt fint rum. Vi bodde i ett stort rum med perfekt smink belysning badkar dusch mycket hög kvalitet genomgående. Vi hade fått ett king rum som var så vackert. Vi var i Kaspers restaurang för afternoon Tea det var som en dröm otroligt fint mycket trevlig stämning och perfekt också för äldre barn. Min dotter är väldigt bortskämd och väl Pampered här, mycket fint av personalen som är fantastisk. Stort tack till ett helt underbart hotell som vi absolut återvänder till snart igen

name: Alina
text: Bett war sehr bequem, Zimmerservice top

name: Karen
text: Un grand merci à toute l'équipe. L'établissement m'a fait vivre une expérience de princesse à l'occasion de mon anniversaire, avec de nombreuses attentions. J'ai été bluffée par la communication entre les différentes équipes et leur professionnalisme. De plus, le service conciergerie nous a été d'un grand secours quand nous avons dû passer une nuit supplémentaire, à cause de l'Eurostar. Il a géré nos billets de retour, super agréable et sans stress pour nous! Un grand merci à la réception qui nous a accueilli lors de notre deuxième nuit "forcée" et qui a été très attentionnée et bienveillante. Du service de grand niveau, à la hauteur de la réputation du Savoy. Bluffée. L'endroit est magnifique, les chambres bien équipées, j'ai été sensible à tous les petits détails en chambre, qui font de cet établissement un vrai Palace. Piscine et salle de sport très agréables. Je recommande vivement le petit déjeuner, trop bon! Ainsi que l'American Bar avec son pianiste. Super sympa. Je suis prête à traverser la Manche et à braver l'Eurostar rien que pour revenir au Savoy!!!!!

name: Macarena
text: La habitación con muchos complementos como cafetera Nespresso , tetera etc , digno de 5 estrellas y el servicio excelente

name: Yamato
text: スタッフさんが笑顔で対応してくださいました。

name: Olfa
text: Location was good

name: Horst
text: ZU viele Touristengruppen. Musik zu laut in der unteren Halle

name: Jolanta
text: bardzo dobre

name: Changhoon
text: 위치는 매우 좋고 특히 영국박물관이나 시내 특이 포인트로 이동하는데 적당한 매우 좋은 장소임. 매니저(나이드신)는 매우 유쾌하고 친절했다. 그런데 스텝들과 소통이나 일처리되는 것을 보면 완전히 뭔가 조직에 문제가 있다. 내가 이 호텔 경영자라면 마치 엑스레이 찍듯이 전체 시스템을 다시 점검해 볼 것이다. 여러모로 엉망이다.

name: Anonymous
text: Do serviço personalizado e cuidado em torno das necessidades do cliente

name: Anonymous
text: どこに行くにも便利な場所。ホテルも部屋もバスルームも雰囲気は最高。カーテンや調度品も素敵でした。また、どの役割のどのスタッフも親切で丁寧。サービスはとても行き届いています。言葉の障壁をものともせず、バーのバーテンダーさんはとても楽しませてくれました。

name: Anonymous
text: Emplacement idéal, magnifique hôtel, personnel accueillant et très disponible, excellent service de concierge.

name: Anonymous
text: toplocatie

name: Anonymous
text: 看展览、看戏剧、去CHINA TOWN都是走路可到。

name: Anonymous
text: スタッフの対応が良かった。

name: Anonymous
text: Es gibt sehr viel Personal im Savoy und es ist sehr gut geschult, höflich, hilfsbereit und um den Gast bemüht. Besonders ist dabei ein Kellner beim Frühstück im " Wintergarten" hervorzuheben, der wirklich einsame Spitze war in seinem Interesse am Gast. Ein weiteres erfreuliches Ereignis war der " afternoon tea" mit einer Klavierspielerin im Zentrum des Raumes. Der Service war ertklassig, die Speisen auch. Faszinierend war auch die Abstimmung der Muster von Geschirr und Stoffservietten, die offenbar zueinander passend hergestellt worden waren.

name: Anonymous
text: コンシェルジュの対応が素晴らしかったです。オペラのチケットを手配していただきました。朝食のスタッフも皆笑顔で対応してくださり、おもてなしの精神が感じられました。伝統的英国流のサービスを受けることができました。

name: Anonymous
text: Nous avons tout aimé ! L’établissement est superbe, le personnel chaleureux et accueillant, les chambres sont splendides et la situation géographique est parfaite !

name: Anonymous
text: Frühstück und Lage sehr gut.
